General.Name: OPG Power Venture Plc
General.Description: OPG Power Ventures Plc, together with its subsidiaries, develops, owns, operates, and maintains private sector power projects in India. It operates thermal and solar power plants. The company primarily sells electric power to public sector undertakings and heavy industrial companies. OPG Power Ventures Plc was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Chennai, India.
General.Address: No. 6, Sardar Patel Road, Chennai, India, 600032
